attributes.title: Dumb app to get
attributes.review: This is really dumb I swear like this literally doesn’t even work that well like I don’t even know why some people would like to get this app it’s so worthless and I recommend anyone who wants to get this app think twice before getting this stupid app

attributes.title: Horribleeeee
attributes.review: The amount of glitches with the app is astonishing. Not only could I not click the buttons but it jacked my whole phone and hacked into the motherboard and exploded my phone in my hands! I now have to have surgery to replace them with prosthetic weenie fingers. I’m currently typing this with my weewee at the hospital.

attributes.title: The official app of white supremacy
attributes.review:
If he rapes children what is he doing to do with the data collected from this app? Assuming we don’t die from the virus, I imagine this is going to be a big waste of money when he loses the election or has a mental breakdown. 
To quote the great Daveed Diggs “Donald Trump is a white supremacist. If you vote for him you’re a white supremacist.”

attributes.title: Horrible do not recommend
attributes.review: Took hours to download once downloaded made my phone glitch terribly after having it for 5 seconds do not recommend threatened me multiple times and it took a lot of personal information

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to see what the hype was about. Once I downloaded it, I was asked about my location? THIS APP IS GOING TO TRACK ME?!?! One I clicked decline my phone shut off for three hours 😡. Had to take it to a phone store for them to say I had a virus and either needed a new phone or to get mine fixed. TERRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.title: Not very happy with this app🤡🤡
attributes.review: The app was horrible my phone kept glitching and my poor phone couldn’t handle that ugly ahhh Cheeto puff in my precious phone so I had to delete the app cause I don’t want my phone to have a racist and a sexist man on this phone so that’s why I’m deleting this app thank you very much #vote for Bernie 2020✨🧚🏼‍♂️💕🙈✨✨

attributes.title: Breaking my silence…
attributes.review: I cannot believe that the mainstream media has brainwashed us to believe that germs, babies, and mailboxes exist. I believe in one thing and one thing only: our Devine savior, Guy Fieri. Due to his glory, our Earth (which is flat) is not compatible with “germs” or “bacteria”. Modern “medicine” is a joke. So are mailboxes. Take that liberal crap and get out of here.

attributes.title: Motorcycles are important
attributes.review:
This app is disgusting!!!! It is absolutely repulsive!!!!!! It totally discriminates motorcycles. It doesn’t even give motorcycle as a language option. I scrolled through the whole language settings and not one language was motorcycle. English is only my second language, my homeland language is motorcycle.

Vroommm vroom grrr vroom vroom!!!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: The waiter told me to get lost after he spit in my food I complain to the manager about this but even she got mad at me so I went home just to find out the store my fridge and microwave now I can never eat mac & cheese the same again and that is the story on how I broke my legs because this app

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app I started noticing weird things happening. My pet unicorn died. All of the plants in my house started screaming at once. My grandma started doing coke. And my underage dog went to some island with Trump🤮. Then a man came in and said if I didn’t vote for trump🤮 then he would throw me into hot lava with sharks. Would not recommend.
